name: Ball Shooter (easygamemaker)
description:
Kill aliens by shooting balls on them.
Be careful not to be killed by your own shoot balls after bouncing.
Collect stars to score extra points.

CONTROLS:
Left arrow key or A: move left
Right arrow key or D: move right
Aim the aliens with the mouse.
Hold left mouse button to increase shoot speed.
Release left mouse button to shoot.

CREDITS:
This game was created with Easy Game Maker
